// modules/user/components/user-settings/user-settings.component.ts import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-settings', templateUrl: './user-settings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-settings.component.css'] }) export class UserSettingsComponent { // Simple placeholder component }
  1. Profile
  2. Settings

User Settings

This is another component within the lazy-loaded User module.

Child routes within lazy-loaded modules work just like regular routes.

In a real application, this page would contain user settings and preferences.
